root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 3-7-1, translated into en
root.data:
The proportion of households with large health expenditures relative to total expenditure or total income is the proportion of households whose health expenditure accounts for a large proportion of the total expenditure or income of the household.

There are two thresholds used to determine whether a household's health expenditure is large, including: Greater than 10% and greater than 25% of the total expenditure or income of the household.
